channel.title: Well I got an error
channel.description:
Well, I have gotten myself into something. I was editting the login messages so that a certain playername would shout out co-owner and all that crap when he logged in. But for some reason, I have gotten this error.
[img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/7163/compilererror.jpg[/img]
Any help :confused:

item.title: Well I got an error
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Well here’s the thing of the error

if (playerRights == 4) && (donator == 0) { yell("Player "+playerName+" of Createscape has logged in."); yell("There are now " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players playing!"); sM("Welcome to Createscape."); sM("Welcome Hidden admin/Co-Owner of Createscape."); sM("New and Improved Client is at http://www.megaupload.com/?d=LK5EWETV"); sM("Go To Forums- Createscape.myfastforum.org"); sM("Be sure to check out our staffzone and ::staffcommands!"); }

And heres a working one

if (playerRights == 1) { yell("Moderator "+playerName+" of Createscape has logged in."); yell("There are now " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players playing!"); sM("Welcome to Createscape."); sM("Welcome Moderator Of Createscape."); sM("New and Improved Client is at http://www.megaupload.com/?d=LK5EWETV"); sM("Go To Forums- Createscape.myfastforum.org"); sM("Be sure to check out our staffzone and ::staffcommands!"); }

Any help?

Edit: I just figured it out…

if (playerRights == 4) { if (donator == 0) { yell("Player "+playerName+" of Createscape has logged in."); yell("There are now " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players playing!"); sM("Welcome to Createscape."); sM("Welcome Hidden admin/Co-Owner of Createscape."); sM("New and Improved Client is at http://www.megaupload.com/?d=LK5EWETV"); sM("Go To Forums- Createscape.myfastforum.org"); sM("Be sure to check out our staffzone and ::staffcommands!"); } }

I used that, thanks guys.

Read full topic

Edit: What about the illegal start of expression with the &&?
